channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal -- UAA Release (LTS)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal -- UAA Release (LTS)

item.title: CVE-2019-3801|2024-09-17T02:56:41.904Z -- pivotal -- uaa%20release%20%28lts%29
item.description: Cloud Foundry cf-deployment, versions prior to 7.9.0, contain java components that are using an insecure protocol to fetch dependencies when building. A remote unauthenticated malicious attacker could hijack the DNS entry for the dependency, and inject malicious code into the component.
